HT_Text_Lux_pyra_sacrifice_2a.message: Sir, there is an intruder in the building!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_sacrifice_2b.message: What?! Destroy him! He cannot interrupt the ceremony!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_sacrifice_2c.message: Wait a second... I sense something...<W 60>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_sacrifice_2d.message: Forsaken spirits of this building, wake up! Arise and kill the intruder!<W 120>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_sacrifice_3a.message:
What happened? Curses! Now we will have to start again...

Look! There's the saboteur who ruined the ceremony...

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_sacrifice_3b.message: You fool! Deactivate the magical device! Can't you see it is going to explode!<W 120><E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_a.message: Oh! Thank you for saving me, I'm eternally grateful. But now my beloved Tut is dead! How can I live without him?<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_b.message: This vase is all that remains of him. I'm sure that part of his soul is inside.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_c.message: I want you to take it. Your heroic actions assure me that you might be the one to bring him back.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_c1.message: Please, find him and bring him back to me. Oh Tut! Why did they do this to you?<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_d.message: Before you go, take this. It's an amulet that Tut gave to me, he was fascinated by it, but I don't know why. To me it's just an amulet.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_e.message: Sphinx, you must meet with me in <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC> as soon as possible.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_e1.message: These events are clear evidence that something extremely sinister is taking place.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_f.message:
The forces at work during this ceremony were far too powerful and demonic for my liking.

We must find the source of this power before it grows to be a real menace.

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_g.message: With that <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC> you can use the portal in the entrance to leave this place.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_g1.message: Again we have no way of knowing exactly where is going to send you but wherever it may be, you must find a way to Heliopolis.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_h.message: Do not worry about Nefertiti, I will find a way to help her to escape from this wretched place.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pyra_Nefertiti_Canopic_I.message: I want you to take this <FC 0,128,0>Gold Ankh<END FC>. It will help you to face the challenges you will inevitably face on your journey.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_Help_GotShield.message:
You got the Shield of Osiris!

This most ancient artifact was said to be wielded by the great god Osiris himself!

You can use the shield to protect yourself from many types of enemy attack and other hazards.

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_Help_NeedAmulet.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>Without a <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC> the Portal God will not allow you to pass.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_Help_AmuletAccepted.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>The Portal God acknowledges your credentials and will provide transport to <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_Help_GotPortalAmulet.message:
You got a Portal Amulet!

This gold artifact was made to honour the Portal God.

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_Help_GotCanopicVase.message:
You got a Canopic Vase!

Part of the soul of Tutankhamen is stored inside.

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_NefertitiHU17_KillEn.message: There's no time to talk to me! Get rid of those awful monsters!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pyramid_NefertitiHU17_Go.message: You should go! There is nothing that can be done here.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Guard_a.message: Good morning, Prince, and happy birthday!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Guard_b.message: Lady Nefertiti was looking for you. She said it was very important, and wants you to meet her in the <FC 128,64,0>Courtyard<END FC> before you go to the state rooms.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Guard_c.message: Your Majesty, Lady Nefertiti insists you meet her in the <FC 128,64,0>Courtyard<END FC> before going to the state rooms. Might I say, it appeared to be urgent... <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer1_Menes_letter_a.message: Lady Nefertiti, I am aware that Prince Tutankhamen has asked for your hand in marriage. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer1_Menes_letter_a1.message: As any astute man will tell you, the logical choice is not necessarily the wisest. A marriage with, say, his brother Akhenaten could have unexpected advantages...<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer1_Menes_letter_b.message: And who knows what the future will bring? You should think carefully about that, Nefertiti... <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer2_GetLetter_a.message: Tutankhamen, at last you are here!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer2_GetLetter_b.message: There's an important <FC 0,128,0>Letter<END FC> here I have to read. Can you get it before someone else finds it?<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer2_GetLetter_c.message: I tried to get it but a gust of wind carried it away. Now it's right up there, at the foot of that statue. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer3_Thanks_leave_b.message: I need to talk to you about this letter, but not here. Someone might be listening. Meet me outside the palace later. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer3_Thanks_leave_c.message: There are some things that you need to know... <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Nefer3_Thanks_leave_d.message: ...and please, my dear Tutankhamen, watch your back! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Presentation_a.message: Ahh, my favourite nephew has come to see his favourite aunt! Happy birthday! My dear, you are growing very fast!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Presentation_b.message: Oh, I see you have found some <FC 0,128,0>Old Amulets<END FC>. Nobody really cares about them these days, but I've been searching for them lately.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Presentation_b1.message: Have you seen any amulets like the one I hold in my hand? <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Presentation_c.message: The whole collection is scattered throughout the palace, and Akhenaten has ordered me to collect them. He wants to store the collection in the <FC 128,64,0>Treasure Room<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Presentation_d.message:
Your brother seems to get more fickle with each passing day. Could you please find the Old Amulets for me, my dear nephew?

I'm far too old to be hunting around the palace for them.

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Complete_a.message: Oh, splendid! That's all the <FC 0,128,0>Old Amulets<END FC> returned! You are too kind to me. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Complete_b.message: If you don't mind, my dear, one last favour. Can you leave them in the <FC 128,64,0>Treasure Room<END FC>? I'm too tired to walk there myself. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Complete_c.message: Here is the key to the <FC 128,64,0>Treasure Room<END FC>. You know where the door is; down the stairs in the next room.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Seti_Complete_d.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Treasure Room Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Presentation_a.message: Many happy returns, my dear brother! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Presentation_b.message: Everyone is busy preparing for your birthday. It's strange... I don't recall such excitement on my birthday. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Presentation_c.message: Please, brother, I'm busy finalizing the plans for your birthday ceremony! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Presentation_d.message: I see you're finally awake... predictably late as usual.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Menes_conspiracy_a.message: Akhenaten, Nefertiti must have the letter. I had it before I talked to her! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Menes_conspiracy_b.message: Hmm, this is getting risky... we need to accelerate our plans. Are the sarcophagi in place? <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Menes_conspiracy_c.message: Yes sir, everything is going as planned. <W 60>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Menes_conspiracy_d.message: I'm going to leave a spare <FC 0,128,0>Sarcophagus Key<END FC> here in case anything happens to the others.  <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Menes_conspiracy_e.message: My little brother is going to get an unexpected birthday surprise this year. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_Menes_conspiracy_g.message: Hahaha!!! Hahaha!!! This party is going to be the best this palace has ever seen! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_CaptureTut_a.message: I want you all to be ready to use the warping sarcophagi to enter the palace when the party begins. We must overrun the palace quickly. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_CaptureTut_b.message: Tonight the throne will finally be mine! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_CaptureTut_c.message: Ahh, my dear brother, what a pleasant surprise! And after I had prepared such a wonderful party for you tonight. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Aken_CaptureTut_d.message: However, you're obviously too impatient to wait and you want your present now. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Tut_WakeUp_a.message: Good morning Prince, and happy birthday! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Tut_WakeUp_b.message: The entire palace is very busy preparing for your birthday ceremony.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_pala_Tut_WakeUp_c.message: Prince, I spoke with Lady Nefertiti earlier. She requested you meet her in the <FC 128,64,0>Courtyard<END FC> this morning.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_CleaningServant1.message: Prince, I'm busy cleaning this wardrobe at the moment.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_CleaningServant2.message: Oh, Prince! That was a nice flowerpot!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_CleaningServant3.message: What a mess! Please don't knock over any more, Prince.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_CleaningServant5.message: <DHP><DP>Please, Prince, can you stop making a complete mess of the room?<W 60>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_WardrobeLocked.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>This wardrobe needs a <FC 0,128,0>Key<END FC> to open it.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_WardrobeBlocked.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>This wardrobe seems to be locked.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_CorriderGuardBlock.message: Your Majesty, Lady Nefertiti insists you meet her in the <FC 128,64,0>Courtyard<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiPartner1.message: Good morning Prince, your brother seems very busy redecorating the palace for the ceremony. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiPartner2.message: Eurrgh! What a grotty little hole. It looks like a rat's nest! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiPartner3.message: I thought they were all taken care of? At least this one has been blocked off. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiSecret.message: No dear, it appears to be one of the old secret corridors which riddle the palace. They've been in the palace longer than I have! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiQuestion.message: Could you please find the amulets for me, my dear nephew? I'm far too old to be hunting around the palace for them.<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiQuestionAgain.message: Dear nephew, have you changed your mind?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiQuestionYes.message: Bless you, my dear! Thank you for helping your dear aunt. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiQuestionNo.message: Please, be nice to your aunt. I don't know what I'm going to say when your brother asks me for them again. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_SetiAccepted.message: It is very nice of you to offer to help me find the amulets. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Sorkon1.message: Prince, I have heard rumours concerning palace security. I requested strengthening the guard, but your brother said he would handle it. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Sorkon2.message: Prince? Prince! Don't go in there, it's not safe! <W 60>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Sorkon3.message: Prince, you never listen to me! You can't risk yourself wandering around those dangerous passages. They are so old that they could collapse at any moment! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Sorkon4.message: Prince, what is going on? I never thought that there was a secret door in such a place. I'm worried about your safety wandering around those dangerous places! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_DishServant1.message: I'm a bit busy with the table arrangements at the moment, Prince. You'll have to entertain yourself for a while. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_DishServant2.message: <DHP><DP>Ack! Prince, please don't walk on my nice clean plates! <W 30>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_DishServant3.message: <DHP><DP>Ahh! The vases! Please don't stand on the table, Prince! <W 30>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Dress1.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N>Do you want to wear this?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_TreasureGuard1.message: Perhaps you should talk to the captain about this. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_TreasureCaptain1.message:
Prince, something terrible has happened. The guards have found the main door to the Treasure Room broken down and all of the arks are empty.

The only thing that we found is that odd sarcophagus in the room.

Please don't touch it, it is obviously something related to the robbery. I have tried to inform your brother Akhenaten, but I can't find him anywhere.

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_DressWrong.message: Oh, Prince, you're not planning on leaving your bedroom without dressing, are you?<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_DressWrong2.message: Please, Prince! Not the pink one! It's really ugly!<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Help_FoundWardrobeKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>You found a <FC 0,128,0>Wardrobe Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_MenesCorrider1.message: Ah, Prince, I see you are very nicely attired today. As always, your taste is impeccable! <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_MenesCorrider2.message: Ah, I neglected to wish you a happy birthday. My apologies, Prince. <E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_GuardHU06_NefLookingF.message:
Good morning sir and happy birthday!

Lady Nefertiti was looking for you. She said it was very important, and would like you to meet her in the Courtyard.

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_GuardHU06_NefFound.message: You found Lady Nefertiti then! Perhaps my Prince would care to see how the preparations for the banquet are going?<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_ServantHU03_Sarcophag.message:
Your brother has been most insistent on decorating the palace with these sarcophagi.

Forgive me for saying this, Prince, but I don't really like them. Their eyes seem to follow your every move...

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_NefertitiHU17_MeetMeO.message:
Wonderful! You got it! I need to talk to you about this letter, but not here. Someone might be listening.

Meet me outside the palace later and we can talk about it. Watch your back, Tutankhamen.

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_NefertitiHU17_GetMyIt.message:
Tutankhamen, at last you are here! Please, you must get my Letter from up there before someone else finds it.

The Letter contains very important information - please hurry!
Tutankhamen, please find my <FC 0,128,0>Letter<END FC>! It's around here somewhere.<E>
Please hurry, before someone else finds it!<E>
Sorry, but I can't talk about the letter in such a public place.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_AkhenatenHU16_EvilHap.message: Many happy returns, my dear brother! It's strange that I don't remember such excitement on my birthday.<E>
Please, brother! I am busy finalizing the plans for your birthday celebrations.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_AkhenatenHU16_Plottin.message: Are all the magical sarcophagi in place?<E>

Excellent! My spoilt little brother is going to get an unexpected birthday surprise this year.

I'm going to leave a spare Sarcophagus Key here in case anything happens to the others.

Muahahaha!!!

Muahahaha!!!

This party is going to be the best this palace has ever seen!

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_SetiHU18_LostItemsNot.message: Oh, you are so kind, nephew. But I'm afraid there are still<N><FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Lux_Palace_SetiQuestItemsRemaining><END FC> more amulets missing.<E>
Excellent! There is only <FC 0,128,0>1<END FC> amulet left, dear nephew.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_SetiHU18_LostItemsCom.message: Thank you for your help, nephew. I'm sure I would never have found the amulets on my own.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_MenesHU09_Plotting01.message: Yes, sir, everything is going as planned.<E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Help_UseLever.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>To operate levers, stand close and press <SB HT_Action_LeverDown><ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Pala_Help_UseSarco.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>With the <FC 0,128,0>Sarcophagus Key<END FC> you can use a sarcophagus<N>by standing close and pressing <SB HT_Action_Enter><ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_Pushable.message:
Objects like this can be pushed and pulled.

Press when close to the object...

...then use to push or pull.

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_LedgeWalk.message:
You can sneak across some narrow ledges.

Approach the fence and press to move against it.

Once against the fence use to move left and right.

To sneak slowly, move lightly.

Press when you wish tocome out of sneak mode.

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_LedgeHang.message:
Some ledges on walls can be grabbed.

Walk off and turn around whilst falling to grab the ledge.

Then use to move left and right.

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_DoorLocked.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>This door is locked and will require a key to open.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_DoorLockedForeve.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>This door is locked from the other<N>side and cannot be opened.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_Crawl.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>Press <SB HT_Action_MummyCrawl> to toggle between<N>walking and crawling.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_FoundBedroomKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Courtyard Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_FoundSarcophagus.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR><N>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Sarcophagus Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_FoundAmulet.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found an <FC 0,128,0>Old Amulet<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Lux_Palace_Help_FoundCourtyardKe.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You found the <FC 0,128,0>Courtyard Key<END FC><ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText>!<E>
